quizDescription: Test your knowledge of comedy movies with this fun trivia quiz!

questions.question: In the movie 'Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy,' what is Ron Burgundy's signature catchphrase?
options: I'm kind of a big deal
questions.explanation: Ron Burgundy's signature catchphrase in 'Anchorman' is 'Stay classy, San Diego!'

questions.question: Which comedy movie features two bumbling burglars trying to break into a family's house during Christmas?
questions.explanation: The comedy movie 'Home Alone' features two bumbling burglars trying to break into a family's house during Christmas.

questions.question: What is the name of the talking toy cowboy in the 'Toy Story' movies?
questions.explanation: The talking toy cowboy in the 'Toy Story' movies is named Woody.

questions.question: In the comedy film 'Groundhog Day,' what event keeps repeating itself?
questions.explanation: In the comedy film 'Groundhog Day,' the event that keeps repeating itself is Groundhog Day.

questions.question: What is the name of the legendary news anchor played by Will Ferrell in 'Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy'?
questions.explanation: The legendary news anchor played by Will Ferrell in 'Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy' is Ron Burgundy.

questions.question: Which comedy movie features a group of friends going on a bachelor party trip to Las Vegas and waking up with no memory of the previous night?
questions.explanation: The comedy movie 'The Hangover' features a group of friends going on a bachelor party trip to Las Vegas and waking up with no memory of the previous night.

questions.question: Which comedy movie features a young boy named Kevin McCallister defending his home from burglars during Christmas?
questions.explanation: The comedy movie 'Home Alone' features a young boy named Kevin McCallister defending his home from burglars during Christmas.

questions.question: What is the name of the talking toy space ranger in the 'Toy Story' movies?
questions.explanation: The talking toy space ranger in the 'Toy Story' movies is named Buzz Lightyear.

questions.question: Which comedy movie follows the misadventures of a man who becomes the caretaker of a resort during the summer?
questions.explanation: The comedy movie 'Caddyshack' follows the misadventures of a man who becomes the caretaker of a resort during the summer.

questions.question: In the comedy film 'Ferris Bueller's Day Off,' what does Ferris Bueller pretend to be when skipping school?
questions.explanation: In 'Ferris Bueller's Day Off,' Ferris Bueller pretends to be sick when skipping school.

questions.question: Which comedy movie features a group of misfit fraternity members who start their own fraternity to compete with the popular frat on campus?
questions.explanation: The comedy movie 'Old School' features a group of misfit fraternity members who start their own fraternity to compete with the popular frat on campus.

questions.question: What is the name of the eccentric anchorman played by Will Ferrell in the comedy film 'Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy'?
questions.explanation: The eccentric anchorman played by Steve Carell in 'Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy' is Brick Tamland.

questions.question: Which comedy movie follows a group of friends who go on a cross-country road trip to attend a wedding?
questions.explanation: The comedy movie 'Road Trip' follows a group of friends who go on a cross-country road trip to attend a wedding.

questions.question: In the movie 'Superbad,' what are the names of the two high school friends trying to secure alcohol for a party?
questions.explanation: In 'Superbad,' the names of the two high school friends trying to secure alcohol for a party are Seth and Evan.

questions.question: What is the name of the talking potato character in the 'Toy Story' movies?
questions.explanation: The talking potato character in the 'Toy Story' movies is named Mr. Potato Head.
